name: Core DataCloud
tag_list: disaster-recovery, draas, data-protection, business-continuity, backup, cloud
overview:
Core DataCloud is a specialist provider of Disaster Recovery as a service solutions, enabling companies to protect their key applications and business reputation by ensuring rapid recovery of servers and data.

Core’s storage platform is based on a high performance EMC Isilon, which ensures rapid recovery of servers and data in a disaster situation.

Core DataCloud company background: • Specialist provider of backup hosting since 1998. • Since 2006 recognised Cloud DR-as-a-service specialist.

Core DataCloud Investments: • Industry-leading EMC and VMware. • Backup technology from Assigra, VirtualSharp, Veeam and Storagecraft. • £2.5M investment in intrastructure since 2006.

Core DataCloud - Focused DR Specialist: • Disaster Recovery of Virtualised IT environments. • Offsite backup and recovery in UK datacentre. • Core DataCloud is focused on one product.

Cloud Infrastructure: • Multi-tenancy infrastructure setup. • Recent investment to extend our Cloud Storage infrastructure using EMC Isilon. • 100TB allocated capacity to existing customers, with an additional 200TB available for new business.
